## PMSynapse CLI v0.1.0 - Initial Release

First public release of the PMSynapse command-line tool.

### Features

#### Core Capabilities
- **IDLC Workflow Management** - Configurable per-team development lifecycles
- **Knowledge Graph** - SQLite-based relationship tracking for issues, research, plans, and code
- **Thoughts System** - Document-based knowledge management with searchable index
- **Claude Session Parser** - Import and analyze Claude Code sessions
- **Daemon Mode** - Background service for continuous workflow management

#### CLI Commands
- `snps daemon` - Start/stop background daemon
- `snps ui` - Launch desktop UI
- `snps thoughts` - Manage knowledge documents
- `snps claude` - Parse and import Claude sessions
- `snps dev` - Development utilities

### Installation

**Linux/macOS:**
```bash
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HelixoidLLC/pmsynapse/main/install.sh | bash
```

**Windows:**
```powershell
irm https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HelixoidLLC/pmsynapse/main/install.ps1 | iex
```

### Quick Start

```bash
# Initialize thoughts system
snps thoughts init
```

### System Requirements

- **Linux:** x86_64 or ARM64, glibc 2.31+
- **macOS:** 10.13+ (High Sierra or later), Intel or Apple Silicon
- **Windows:** Windows 10/11, x86_64

### Known Limitations

- Desktop UI requires separate installation (Tauri app)
- CozoDB integration planned for future release
- Linear integration requires MCP server configuration

### Documentation

Full documentation available at: https://github.com/HelixoidLLC/pmsynapse
